 2019-11392019-08-07,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActGreenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
SubjectPart 1 of the Greenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act Regulations (Alberta)
PrecisPART 1 OF THE GREENHOUSE GAS POLLUTION PRICING ACT REGULATIONS (ALBERTA) in order to ensure carbon pricing applies broadly in Canada by adding Alberta to Part 1 of Schedule 1 and to Schedule 2.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0294 Publication Date: 2019-08-21
